import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useTask } from '../context/TaskContext'; import { ClipboardDocumentListIcon, PlusCircleIcon, CheckCircleIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, UserIcon, BuildingOfficeIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Dashboard = () => { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const { getTaskStats, getUserTasks } = useTask(); const stats = getTaskStats(currentUser?.id); const userTasks = getUserTasks(currentUser?.id); // Get recent tasks (last 5) const recentTasks = userTasks .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt) - new Date(a.createdAt)) .slice(0, 5); // Get upcoming tasks (next 3 due dates) const upcomingTasks = userTasks .filter(task => !task.completed && task.dueDate) .sort((a, b) => new Date(a.dueDate) - new Date(b.dueDate)) .slice(0, 3); const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon: Icon, color, link }) => (

{title}

{value}

); const TaskItem = ({ task }) => (

{task.title}

Due: {task.dueDate ? new Date(task.dueDate).toLocaleDateString() : 'No due date'}

{task.priority}
); return (

Welcome back, {currentUser?.name}!

Here's what's happening with your construction projects today.

{/* Stats Grid */}
{/* Recent Tasks */}

Recent Tasks

View all
{recentTasks.length > 0 ? (
{recentTasks.map(task => ( ))}
) : (

No tasks yet

Create your first task
)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

New Task Edit Profile
{/* Upcoming Deadlines */}

Upcoming Deadlines

{upcomingTasks.length > 0 ? (
{upcomingTasks.map(task => (

{task.title}

{new Date(task.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}

{task.priority}
))}
) : (

No upcoming deadlines

)}
{/* Company Info */}

Task Manager

Construction Services

Building stronger structures with professional task management.

ðŸ”¨ 10% OFF New Projects
); }; export default Dashboard;
